review: Bought for the grandchildren in their twenty's and they love it!Betty
author: Betty

review: Works good, initial set up took some time as it depends on your router set up.
author: Sujit

review: Am waiting on a female to female HDMI connector; then will be able to connect to TV without getting behind yhe set.  Should work well then.
author: Amazon Customer "reader's husband"

review: Better than Amazon Fire tv stick.
author: Vinay

review: Works great, easy set-up.  Nice slide show feature and weather features, really like the quick access to stream Netflix and Pandora. Extremely disappointed it doesn't stream Amazon Prime...unless you are using a laptop and have Google Chrome set-up (not as convenient as clicking an app on your phone/tablet).  Didn't find that out until after we purchased it.
author: Epleys

review: Not very impressed. Lots of glitches when using apple products, which was expected. Video streaming buffers and skips often.
author: Taylor ravenna

review: Works great. Got to get more for the kids in college.
author: ROB
